Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Starting with the Accounts Payable Clerk (Mary) in Interview 1. She processes an invoice, checks for a PO, logs it, sends to purchasing, confirms goods received, matches PO with invoice, sends confirmation to manager, and schedules payment. So, activities are checking PO, logging, forwarding, confirming goods, matching PO, sending confirmation, sending to manager, scheduling.

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Interview 2 by Dan: Similar to Mary but mentions that sometimes an invoice number is missing. He can't proceed without the PO and sends an email if discrepancy is too big.

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Interview 3 by Carlos: He's usually last, confirming everything, but may reject or investigate if suspicious, then sends it back. So confirm, reject, investigate.

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Interview 4 by Rita: Escalates to her role when there are exceptions. She might hand off to AP or Purchasing and ensure the invoice can clear.

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Interview 5 by Karen: Asks for relationships with suppliers or revises invoices when needed. She helps resolve issues without directly handling approvals.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Now, consolidating these. The sequence starts with receiving the invoice, checking for PO, logging, forwarding, confirming goods, matching PO, sending confirmation to manager, then payment.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Gateways: Log/Log (checking PO), Forward/Forward (to Purchasing), Confirm/Confirm (goods), Review/Review (PO), Approve Approve (Manager). Exceptions: missing PO, system rejects, investigate.

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Roles: Various like Accounts Payable Clerk, Purchasing Officer, Department Manager, Accounts Payable Supervisor, Supplier Relationship Manager.

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Artifacts: Invoice, PO, confirmation email, payment run.

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Exceptions: Inconsistent POs, system rejects, investigate.
